学園祭: (がくえんさい) - school festival; campus festival
学園紛争: (がくえんふんそう) - campus dispute; campus strife
学園都市: (がくえんとし) - university town; college town
学園長: (がくえんちょう) - headmaster; principal; dean; provost; rector
学報: (がくほう) - academic bulletin; school gazette
学士入学: (がくしにゅうがく) - (yoji) admission of university graduates to an undergraduate program
学士院賞: (がくしいんしょう) - Japan Academy award
学外: (がくがい) - outside the school; extramural
学寮: (gakuryou) - student hostel, dormitory (por exemplo, para trabalhadores de fábrica)
学年: (がくねん) - academic year/school year; year in school/grade in school
学年別漢字配当表: (がくねんべつかんじはいとうひょう) - list of kanji by school year
学年暦: (がくねんれき) - school year calendar; calendar of school events and dates
学年末: (がくねんまつ) - end of school year
学府: (がくふ) - educational institution; academic centre; academic center
学徒: (がくと) - student; follower; students and pupils
学振: (がくしん) - Japan Society for the Promotion of Science; JSPS
学期末: (がっきまつ) - end of term; end of semester
学校が引けてから: (がっこうがひけてから) - after school
学校へ通う: (がっこうへかよう) - to attend school
学校債券: (がっこうさいけん) - school bond or debenture
学校図書館: (がっこうとしょかん) - school library
学校教育: (がっこうきょういく) - school education; formal education
学校教育法: (がっこうきょういくほう) - School Education Law
学校文法: (がっこうぶんぽう) - school grammar (esp. middle school grammar)
学校新聞: (がっこうしんぶん) - school paper
学校法人: (がっこうほうじん) - (legally) incorporated educational institution
学校生活: (がっこうせいかつ) - school life
学校用品: (がっこうようひん) - school requisites (supplies)
学校給食: (がっこうきゅうしょく) - school lunch
学校群制度: (がっこうぐんせいど) - school grouping system
学校行事: (がっこうぎょうじ) - school event
学校裏サイト: (がっこううらサイト) - underground website or online message board for a school where students typically exchange information on tests, commit cyberbullying, etc.
学業不振: (がくぎょうふしん) - (yoji) poor academic performance; underachievement
学業成績: (がくぎょうせいせき) - school record; scholastic performance
学歴による差別: (がくれきによるさべつ) - discrimination on the basis of educational level (background)
学歴偏重: (がくれきへんちょう) - (yoji) overstressing academic background
学歴社会: (がくれきしゃかい) - academic meritocracy; education-conscious society; society that places (excessive) emphasis on academic records
学歴詐称: (がくれきさしょう) - (yoji) false statement (misrepresentation) of one's academic career
学歴難民: (がくれきなんみん) - over-qualified person; over-educated person (unable to find a job); educational refugee
学活: (がっかつ) - class activities; homeroom activities
学生会: (がくせいかい) - student council (details vary widely but a body of students that takes part in overseeing student behaviour or student activities)
学生会館: (がくせいかいかん) - student union; student center; students' hall
学生割引: (がくせいわりびき) - student discount
学生寮: (がくせいりょう) - student accommodation; student dormitory
学生指導: (がくせいしどう) - student advising; student guidance
学生横綱: (がくせいよこづな) - {sumo} university amateur champion
学生気質: (がくせいかたぎ) - (yoji) student temperament; students' way of thinking
学生生活: (がくせいせいかつ) - student (college) life
学生結婚: (がくせいけっこん) - student marriage (esp. university, college, etc. students)
学生自治会: (がくせいじちかい) - student body; student council
学生語: (がくせいご) - language used by students; students' slang
学生運動: (がくせいうんどう) - student movement
学生部長: (がくせいぶちょう) - dean of students
学生鞄: (がくせいかばん) - school bag (usu. handheld or hung from the shoulder); schoolbag
学生食堂: (がくせいしょくどう) - school cafeteria
学界: (がっかい) - academic world; academia; academic circles; scientific world; learned circles
学研: (がっけん) - study and research; scholarship and research
学科: (gakka) - study subject, course of study; department (universidade, etc.)
学科試験: (がっかしけん) - examinations in academic subjects
学究肌: (がっきゅうはだ) - academic type; scholarly turn of mind
学童保育: (がくどうほいく) - care of schoolchildren outside of school time
学童疎開: (がくどうそかい) - evacuation of school children (from major cities to more rural areas, esp. during late World War II)
